lead_paragraph: Chelsea has apologized to a former player who was sexually abused while a member of the club's youth team, and said Saturday it was "inappropriate" to pay him 50,000 pounds ($77,500) to keep the matter out of the public domain.

headline.print_headline: Chelsea Apologizes to Victim of Sex Abuse
headline.main: Chelsea Apologizes to Victim of Sex Abuse

snippet: Chelsea has apologized to a former player who was sexually abused while a member of the club's youth team, and said Saturday it was "inappropriate" to pay him 50,000 pounds ($77,500) to keep the matter out of the public domain....
